page.description: Retrieve external tables records in a cr-lf separated list given a list of records or keys.
page.syntax: Record_List as C = External_record_content_from_key_get(C tablename,C content_expression,C records[,C key_expression])

argument.name: content_expression
argument.description: A logical expression that selects records from the table.

argument.name: records
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of key values for the records that you want to retrieve.

argument.name: key_expression
argument.description: Optional. Default = "recno()". The name of an index tag.

page.discussion: The TABLE.EXTERNAL_RECORD_CONTENT_FROM_KEY_GET() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of records from an external table.
page.example:
dim keys as C keys =
<<%a% 1 3 %a% ? table.external_record_content_from_key_get("customer", "lastname", keys) = Harrison Brown ? table.external_record_content_from_key_get("customer", "firstname", keys, "lastname") = Laddie Evan
